SELECT M.MS_ID msId, DATE_FORMAT(M.MONTH_DATE,'%Y-%m') monthDateStr, M.SHOP_ID shopId, S.SHOP_NAME shopName, M.RETAINED_PROFITS retainedProfits, M.RETAINED_PROFITS_RATE retainedProfitsRate, M.GROSS_PROFIT grossProfit, M.GROSS_PROFIT_RATE grossProfitRate, M.TOTAL_ORDER totalOrder, M.SUCCEED_ORDER succeedOrder, M.FAILED_ORDER failedOrder, M.SALE_AMOUNT saleAmount, M.COST_AMOUNT costAmount, M.ADVERT_AMOUNT advertAmount, M.SERVICE_AMOUNT serviceAmount, M.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT virtualAmount, M.TOTAL_COST totalCost FROM MONTH_SALES M LEFT JOIN USER_SHOP S ON S.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.SHOP_STATE = '1' AND S.SHOP_ID = M.SHOP_ID WHERE M.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND M.SHOP_ID IS NOT NULL
AND M.SHOP_ID IS NULL
ORDER BY M.MONTH_DATE ASC
SELECT M.* FROM MONTH_SALES M,USER_SHOP S WHERE S.USER_ID = #{userId} AND M.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.SHOP_STATE='1' AND S.SHOP_ID = M.SHOP_ID
SELECT M.* FROM MONTH_SALES M WHERE M.USER_ID = #{userId} AND M.SHOP_ID IS NULL

SELECT M.MONTH_DATE monthDate, DATE_FORMAT(M.MONTH_DATE,'%Y年%m月') monthDateStr, M.RETAINED_PROFITS retainedProfits, M.GROSS_PROFIT grossProfit, M.TOTAL_ORDER totalOrder, M.SUCCEED_ORDER succeedOrder, M.FAILED_ORDER failedOrder, M.SALE_AMOUNT saleAmount, M.COST_AMOUNT costAmount, M.ADVERT_AMOUNT advertAmount, M.SERVICE_AMOUNT serviceAmount, M.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT virtualAmount, M.TOTAL_COST totalCost FROM MONTH_SALES M WHERE M.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM USER_SHOP S WHERE S.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.SHOP_ID = M.SHOP_ID AND S.SHOP_STATE = '1' AND S.SHOP_ID = #{shopId})
AND M.SHOP_ID IS NULL
AND M.MONTH_DATE <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND M.MONTH_DATE >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY M.MONTH_DATE ASC LIMIT 12

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.MONTH_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') monthDateStr, SUM(A.TOTAL_ORDER) totalOrder, SUM(A.SUCCEED_ORDER) succeedOrder, SUM(A.FAILED_ORDER) failedOrder, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) saleAmount, SUM(A.COST_AMOUNT) costAmount, SUM(A.ADVERT_AMOUNT) advertAmount, SUM(A.SERVICE_AMOUNT) serviceAmount, SUM(A.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT) virtualAmount FROM MONTH_SALES A,USER_SHOP S WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.SHOP_ID = S.SHOP_ID AND S.SHOP_STATE = '1' GROUP BY A.MONTH_DATE ORDER BY A.MONTH_DATE DESC

SELECT A.SHOP_ID shopId, S.SHOP_NAME shopName, A.YEARSTR yearStr, SUM(A.TOTAL_ORDER) totalOrder, SUM(A.SUCCEED_ORDER) succeedOrder, SUM(A.FAILED_ORDER) failedOrder, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) saleAmount, SUM(A.COST_AMOUNT) costAmount, SUM(A.ADVERT_AMOUNT) advertAmount, SUM(A.SERVICE_AMOUNT) serviceAmount, SUM(A.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT) virtualAmount FROM(SELECT C.SHOP_ID, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(C.MONTH_DATE,'%Y'),'-01-01') YEARSTR, C.TOTAL_ORDER, C.SUCCEED_ORDER, C.FAILED_ORDER, C.SALE_AMOUNT, C.COST_AMOUNT, C.ADVERT_AMOUNT, C.SERVICE_AMOUNT, C.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT FROM MONTH_SALES C WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId} ) A,USER_SHOP S WHERE S.SHOP_ID = A.SHOP_ID AND S.SHOP_STATE='1' GROUP BY A.YEARSTR,A.SHOP_ID
